description:
Kurenai Gekkou is a freshman in and the student council president of Miyasaka High. Due to a deed committed by his younger twin brother, http://anidb.net/ch30170 [Hinata], he began to constantly seek out power. He is demonstrated to be quick-witted and highly intelligent, wields an ancient fencing-like sword known as Spell Error, and is trained in several traditional arts of exorcism. As the student council president, Gekkou has made a contract with the lightning demon http://anidb.net/ch30167 [Mirai] and is tasked to be the guardian of the Holy Ground, a location with special properties over which Miyasaka High was built. He claims Mirai as his property and is very possessive over her. He proclaims himself to be a genius and considers himself to be stronger than his brother.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kurenai Gekkou
